column5: **No pets please**  This is Suite #5 of our 6 room Bed and Breakfast.   The Barrister's is a house with six private guest rooms separated by a hallway. There is no dining room or common area.   The Barrister's is managed by the Econolodge located directly across the street.   - 224 Sq Ft  - Queen Size Bed  - Hardwood Floor  - Settee & Bed Bench  - Private Bath with Shower & Pedestal Sink  - A/C & Heat  - Cable TV w/ Showtime
